category.name: NX
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_Applications
preference.preference_description: List of NX client applications that can be launched from Teamcenter Client. The allowed values are NX, NX Layout, NX Learning Edition, NX Viewer, CAM Express, CAM Single Machine Environment, Mechatonics Concept Designer, Simcenter 3D, and Solid Edge CAM Pro. The default value is only NX. However, if a new application is available, in addition to adding it to this preference, a new preference TC_NX_App_Switch_For_XXX, where XXX would be the name of the new application added, needs to be defined with the value that can be used to launch XXX.
